familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $2,501 - $5,000 in Rent or Royalties income from FIVE ACRE JV (Industrial Real Estate in Union, NJ) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Five Acre JV (Industrial Real Estate In Union, NJ)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $2,501 - $5,000 in Rent or Royalties income from FIVE ACRE JV (Industrial Real Estate in Union, NJ) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Five Acre JV (Industrial Real Estate In Union, NJ)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner served as Non-member Manager of Flatbush 340 Lender, LLC from Dec 1, 2015, to Jan 1, 2017. Jared Kushner received $100,001 - $1,000,000 and $15,001 - $50,000 in Interest income via two separate transactions from Flatbush 340 Lender LLC (Loan Receivable from 9 Dekalb Owner LLC; Brooklyn, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. Because there is no indication his interest in this entity has been divested or placed into a blind trust, it is marked in this database as an active potential conflict of interest.
familyMemberEthics.business: Flatbush 340 Lender LLC (Loan Receivable from 9 Dekalb Owner LLC; Brooklyn, NY)
